name: tags
title: Tags
description:
`tags.csv` is a [tabular data](https://datapackage.org/standard/glossary/#tabular-data) ressources from a GeoLocator Data Package. As we assumes that a tag is only deployed once on a single species, this table contains informations related to the device, the deployment and the animal equiped. Data collected on the bird which might be changing over time (e.g., `age`) should be provided in the [`observations`](/GeoLocator-DP/GeoLocator-DP/core/observations) table.

Additional data can be provided by following the [Movebank tag attribute dictionary](https://www.movebank.org/cms/movebank-content/movebank-attribute-dictionary#tag_attributes) and [Movebank deployement attribute dictionary](https://www.movebank.org/cms/movebank-content/movebank-attribute-dictionary#deployment_attributes)

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.description: The company or person that produced the tag. When appropriate, please use 'Swiss Ornithological Institue', 'Migrate Technology Limited', or 'Lund University'.

fields.name: firwmare
fields.description: The tag firmware and version used during the deployment.

fields.name: weight
fields.description: Weight of the device with harness. Expressed in grams.

fields.name: attachment_type
fields.description: The way a tag is attached to an animal. Use values from [Movebank `attachment type` concept](https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000052) values if possible. Assumed to be `harness` if not provided. You can also provide the material used.

fields.name: readout_method
fields.description: The way the data are received from the tag. Use value from [Movebank `tag readout method` concept](https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/MVB/current/MVB000188/) if possible. Assumed to be `tag-retrieval` if not provided

fields.name: scientific_name
fields.description: Scientific name of the tagged species. Use `NA` if the tag was not deployed.

fields.name: ring_number
fields.description: Ring number associated with the tagged species. Use `NA` if the tag was not deployed.

fields.name: tag_comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the tag, deployement or animal.
